Articles.Content:
Greetings,

at first I would like to say this is realy great game and I love it. I have Steam instalations and played for a while by now. But from the begining, game is constantly crashing. After a few loading or some time. Mainly during the loading.

I am attaching some crash reports.

By now, I have a few mods instaled, but this problems is here even without mods.

Any idea?

Thank you very much.

[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ztu8xrzh4ku8owc/AAAyG6VxGa2OkgXSlRW8F7BKa?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/ztu8xrzh4ku8owc/AAAyG6VxGa2OkgXSlRW8F7BKa?dl=0)

[https://www.dropbox.com/sh/sin07tecymyheaw/AABaDGrKBWVQtA8917TKQT1Ga?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/sin07tecymyheaw/AABaDGrKBWVQtA8917TKQT1Ga?dl=0)

"OutOfMemoryException: Out of memory"

You're running out of memory. How much system memory do you have? If it's 4GB or less you'll have problems.
I had the same error and, according to the error.log file, it appears you have a 4GB system. Try reducing the window resolution in Settings before running the game. This solved the problem for me.
